description.name: injbep20
description.tagline: Injective Protocol bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-inj Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Injective Protocol bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/inj receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/inj wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
